title: recipes_Apple_Pudding
text:
Title: Apple Pudding.
.
Description: This apple pudding recipe is incredibly easy to make with tart apples and staple pantry ingredients when you need a tasty last-minute dessert..
.
Ingredients:.
- 6 tart apples - peeled, cored and sliced.
- 0.25 cup all-purpose flour.
- 1 cup sugar.
- 1 pinch salt.
- 2 cups milk.
.
Instructions:.
- Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)..
- Toss apples with flour, sugar, and salt; place in a 9x9-inch baking dish. Pour in just enough milk to reach the top of the apples, without covering them..
- Bake in the preheated oven for 45 minutes, or until apples are tender..
.
Nutrients:.
calories: 260 kcal.
carbohydrateContent: 60 g.
cholesterolContent: 7 mg.
fiberContent: 4 g.
proteinContent: 4 g.
saturatedFatContent: 1 g.
sodiumContent: 35 mg.
sugarContent: 52 g.
fatContent: 2 g.
unsaturatedFatContent: 0 g.
.
Serves: 6 servings.
